name: Robots, Guns, and a Deck o' Cards
name_original: Robots, Guns, and a Deck o' Cards
description:
Oh your looking for a description eh?

Well then, welcome to... "The Overgrowth". You're here to shoot up some robots and solve a few puzzles with your trusty gun and signature deck of ability altering cards!

Credits:

Code, music, art, level design | by Elecarno (This game was developed solo for the GJL Games Parade 2021)
Thank you to my playtesters:
『Thomgamer51』
-Sir Adiack off sea land-
Matchsticks
